DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate efficacy alpha tocopherol prevention contrast-induced nephropathy CKD patient undergo elective coronary procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Alpha Tocopherol Prevention Contrast-induced Nephropathy Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Contrast-induced nephropathy ( CIN ) increase likelihood patient morbidity mortality follow coronary procedure . Contrast agent cause acute deterioration renal function via generation reactive oxygen specie . Vitamin E ( alpha tocopherol ) demonstrate anti-oxidant anti-inflammation . The present study design evaluate administration antioxidant vitamin E ( alpha tocopherol ) mean prevent CIN patient .
DOC.criteria: serum creatinine level > 1.2 mg/dL baseline creatinine clearance level < 60 mL/min ( measure recent sample , drawn within 2 month prior begin study ) patient acute kidney injury end stage renal disease ( require dialysis ) unstable renal function ( evidenced change serum creatinine > 0.5 mg/dL , > 25 % , within 14 day prior study ) allergy contrast agent mechanical ventilation suffer congestive heart failure , cardiogenic shock emergent angiography . receive NAC , mannitol , diuretic , theophylline , dopamine , vitamin E contrast agent within 14 day study
